/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall, leafless trees that reach towards the sky, their bare branches creating a stark contrast against the overcast sky. The ground is covered in a blanket of snow, adding a serene and tranquil atmosphere to the scene. In the distance, a red car can be seen driving down the road, adding a pop of color to the otherwise monochrome landscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of dusk, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the snow-covered ground and the rough bark of the trees.
